org.netbeans.lib.uihandler

Interface Decorable


  • public interface Decorable
    A callback interface of a decorated representation of LogRecord. Should be passed into LogRecords.decorate(java.util.logging.LogRecord, org.netbeans.lib.uihandler.Decorable) and will receive appropriate call-backs.
    Since:
    1.13

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDisplayName(String n)
      Set the display name.
      void setIconBaseWithExtension(String base)
      Set the icon base.
      void setName(String n)
      Set the name.
      void setShortDescription(String shortDescription)
      Set the short description.

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        void setName(String n)
        Set the name.
        Parameters:
        n - the name of the log record

      • setDisplayName

        void setDisplayName(String n)
        Set the display name.
        Parameters:
        n - the display name of the log record

      • setIconBaseWithExtension

        void setIconBaseWithExtension(String base)
        Set the icon base.
        Parameters:
        base - the icon base, including the extension, of the log record

      • setShortDescription

        void setShortDescription(String shortDescription)
        Set the short description.
        Parameters:
        shortDescription - the short description of the log record
